column1: Major winners at the 1st Academy Awards included 7th Heaven and Sunrise, with three awards apiece (the latter winning for Unique and Artistic Picture), and [1] receiving two awards, including [2] Picture which was retroactively acknowledged as the highest honour, and which later became Best Picture.
